author: Deric Phillips
subject: miscellaneous
body:
This is just an inconsequential thought, but it recently occurred to me that 
it would be one of the greatest comics ever if Monkeypunch and Will Eisner 
(if he's still alive) got together to make a Lupin/Spirit
crossover.  I don't know how many of you are familiar with the Spirit, but 
it's a crimefighter comic from the forties with a very similar feel to that 
of Lupin III's, and Eisner's drawing style would accomodate Monkeypunch's 
beautifully, I believe.  If anyone agrees with me, I'd like to hear it, but 
otherwise this was just a random thought.
